Title: Javac XTR-PRO-DV A2L dual voltage refrigerant recovery unit 240/110
Description: The portable, dual voltage Javac XTR-PRO-DV recovery machine unit has a heavy duty 1/2 HP high torque AC motor for reduced noise while increasing liquid pumping by up to 50%, ensuring residual vapour moves faster for quick results. Suitable for recovering CFCs, HCFCs and HFs, with blends of A and B variations of most of these gases, the XTR-PRO-DV incorporates a comprehensive built-in manifold analyser.

Title: Javac Procharge 100 digital charging scales 100kg
Description: The Javac Procharge 100 digital charging scale is part of the brand's range of refrigerant servicing tools. With a compact weighing platform and tough case, transportation of this scale is easy and safe while a high resolution LCD display makes it simple to use.

Title: Javac XTR-Ultra XTR-ULTRA-A2L XTR ultra recovery unit uk a2l 240v
Description: A lightweight version of the popular XTR, this Javac XTR Ultra 240V refrigeration recovery unit is suitable for HFC/HCFC/CFC refrigerant. Weighing just 8.4 kgs, this compact unit is an ideal entry-level recovery machine and offers excellent value for money as well as suitability for small or medium-sized refrigeration and air conditioning applications.

Title: Fieldpiece MR45INT A2L digital recovery machine 110V
Description: With onboard system monitoring, the Fieldpiece MR45 110V recovery machine is able to adjust motor performance to handle liquid while running faster than ever on vapour. Stepping up low voltage at the power plug for maximum motor power if high voltage drop causes issues, this machine is designed with a 1HP motor and large condenser for reliability even on the hottest and lengthiest of jobs. Lightweight at under 10kg and able to withstand driving rain, MR45 features an easy-read display and single dial as well as straight hose connection ports ensuring ease of use in any situation.

Title: Fieldpiece SR47INT joblink wireless refrigerant scale 114kg
Description: Lightweight yet robust, the Fieldpiece SR47INT wireless refrigerant scale offers high levels of performance through modern wireless technology working at a range of up to 300M. Featuring a new wireless protocol, this smart scale sends platform measurements to the included remote display as well as to the Fieldpiece Job Link mobile app for easy working on your smartphone. It's also possible to view weight measurements wirelessly on SM380VINT and SM480VINT refrigerant manifolds. Suitable for a wide variety of conditions, SR47INT is a reliable and practical choice for the easy measurement of refrigerant when reclaiming or recharging a system.

Title: Imperial Promax RG3000 ultra compact recovery machine 240v
Description: Weighing just 8kg, the lightweight and compact Imperial Promax RG3000 recovery machine unit provides the impressive recovery power you'd expect from a much larger machine. Compatible with A2L refrigerant, RG3000 recovers common CFC, HCFC and HFC refrigerants as liquid or vapour using its oil-free compressor before running a full self-purge so it's clean and ready to take on its next recovery task with no effort on your part.

Title: Javac XTR-ALTIMA-A2L twin head recovery unit 240v
Description: A multi-purpose unit, the Javac XTR-ALTIMA-A2L recovery machine unit has a spark-proof design and is suitable for use with a wide range of CFCs, HCFCs and HFCs, blends and A and B variations as well as A2L flammable refrigerants such as R32, R1234yf and R1234ze. This smart unit includes a comprehensive built-in manifold analyser and purge and self-cleaning takes place on the fly so there's no need to shutdown to prepare for the next job.

Title: Advanced Engineering Promax RG4 refrigerant recovery unit 240v
Description: Offering competitive recovery rates on all refrigerants, including A2L, this 240V Bosch Promax RG4.0A recovery machine unit incorporates a 1/2 HP/1750 rpm motor for reliably high levels of recovery in all conditions. Packaged in robust and recognisable Bosch housing with an oil-free compressor and auto pressure reset, the RG4 combines a lightweight and compact design with excellent performance.

Title: Fieldpiece MR45INT recovery machine (eu)
Description: Compatible with all A1 and A2L the Fieldpiece MR45INT with onboard system monitoring for air conditioning and refrigeration systems can adjust motor performance to help it handle liquid. Able to run twice as fast on vapour, this unit copes with high voltage drop by stepping up low voltage at the power plug to deliver power to its reliable 1HP motor. Offering high levels of performance, even during long or hot tasks, MR45 combines a large condensor with a powerful motor and provides ease of use via a simple single dial and a clear, easy to read display. Lightweight and with handy features including straight connection ports and built-in power cord storage, this machine is designed to make life simple.
